posts.post_title: Wanted: 1912 Helmar L1 Leather Prominent Player
posts.post_content: Would like to get one of these with a clear picture - ideally of Cobb, Matty, WaJo, etc.  Please PM me with what you have, or email me at [url]tanmanbaseballfan@gmail.com[/url] - thank you!
